I am a postgraduate student in the University of Glasgow's
[Institute of Neuroscience and Psychology](http://www.gla.ac.uk/researchinstitutes/neurosciencepsychology/) working with [Lisa Debruine](http://facelab.org/People/debruine).

My current work focuses on the influence of sexual orientation and parental imprinting on partner choice and is part of the [KINSHIP](https://erc.europa.eu/) project. You can find out about all of my projects in the [Research](research.html) tab.
